events.name: Epic Failure by Minister Dick Von ZombieSlayer
events.description: The Temple services are meant as live discussions rather than lectures, so these will not be recorded to respect everyone's privacy when participating. However, the Minister's introduction to the discussion will be recorded and available on the Satanic Ministry website.

events.name: After Services Activities: Dark Arts and Crafts
events.description: Join Satanic artists CraftSatan and Zoey Inferni for a very chill craft and chat session.

events.name: After Services Activities: Hellfire Club
events.description: Join Dr. Eric Sprankle for a presentation on Satanists in Therapy: Managing Stigma to Access Mental Health Care

events.name: After Services Activities: Dungeons & Dragons
events.description: Join Dungeon Mistress Kaelea and a team of intrepid adventurers as they unravel mysteries in the Kingdom of Ekerion, a 5th Edition Dungeons & Dragons homebrew campaign. Tune in for laughs, silly voices, twists and turns, and lots of dice-rolling shenanigans.

events.name: After Services Activities: Satanic Writers Circle
events.description: Join us for our Satanic Writers Circle, lead by Meilin Kikkano

events.name: After Services Activities: Music and Videos from Whimsical Blasphemy
events.description: Live from Salem, join Mercy Maelica for music and videos! Learn more at whimsicalblasphemy.com.

events.name: After Services Activities: Satanic Sober Faction
events.description: TST Sober Faction will be hosting special meetings after weekly services such as Sober Book club hosted by Priest Joe Dee, Seven Ritual Workshop hosted by Reverend Jon Eldritch, & free talk Q&A sessions hosted by all of Sober Faction Council. Heal Thyself, Hail Thyself! Sobriety Without Superstition.

events.name: After Services Activities: TST SoCal Racial and Ethnic Diversity Group
events.description: Join Satanists of Color within TST as they discuss how BIPOC issues align with our 7 tenets. BIPOC and allies of all walks of life welcome.
